alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 12:21PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 1245 PM EST... At 1221 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a gusty shower over Pinecrest, or near South Miami, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Gables, South Miami, Kendall, Pinecrest, Richmond Heights, Palmetto Bay, West Kendall, Zoo Miami, The Crossings, West Perrine, Sunset, Kendale Lakes, Richmond West, Glenvar Heights, Country Walk, The Hammocks, The Falls, Howard, Palmetto Estates and Three Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
